comments:
I get a NullPointerException (see below) when setting a filename for a 
WizardNewFileCreationPage. The exception occurres when pressing the next button 
on the wizard page. I used the integration build I20030122 on Windows NT.
(In Version 2.0.x this worked without problems)

To reproduce this error, create a INewWizard and use the following code:

public void init(IWorkbench workbench, IStructuredSelection selection) {
   this.selection = selection;
} 

public void addPages() {
  super.addPages();
  newFileCreationPage = new WizardNewFileCreationPage("NFCP", selection);
  // setting a filename results in a NullPointerException.
  newFileCreationPage.setFileName("projectset.psf"); //$NON-NLS-1$
  addPage(newFileCreationPage);
}		



Occurred exception:

This is an issue with linked resources.

WizardNewFolderMainPage has the potential for the same problem. However, it 
does not currently have API to set the resource name.

Fixed WizardNewFileCreationPage and WizardNewFolderMainPage. Added test case to 
UIWizardAuto.
Fixed in >20030203.
